description: This file defines the SpiderTools class, which provides web search, scraping, and crawling functionalities by wrapping an external Spider class. It includes methods for searching, scraping URLs, and crawling web pages, with logging and error handling.

classes.name: SpiderTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing web search, scrape, and crawl functionalities using an external Spider implementation.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the SpiderTools with optional max_results, url, and parameters, and sets up the toolkit with search, scrape, and crawl tools.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a web search with a query, returning results as a JSON string.

methods.name: scrape
methods.description: Scrapes the content of a webpage given its URL, returning the content in markdown format.

methods.name: crawl
methods.description: Crawls web pages starting from a URL up to a specified limit, returning the results as a JSON string.

methods.name: _search
methods.description: Internal method that interacts with the external Spider to perform a search and handle errors.

methods.name: _scrape
methods.description: Internal method that interacts with the external Spider to scrape a URL and handle errors.

methods.name: _crawl
methods.description: Internal method that interacts with the external Spider to crawl URLs and handle errors.
